articles.title: Updated obesity treatment guidelines for children and teens include medications, surgery for some young people - CNN
articles.description: Updated American Academy of Pediatrics guidelines for treatment of obesity urge prompt use of behavior therapy and lifestyle changes, and they say surgery and medications should be used for some young people.

articles.author: Zoe Guy
articles.title: 'M3gan' Earns $30 Million, Outperforming Estimates - Vulture
articles.description: ‘M3gan,’ the killer-doll flick that set the internet ablaze when the titular android did a little dance in an October trailer, slaughtered box-office estimates with its $30.2 million opening weekend at 3,509 North American theaters.
articles.content: Shes an icon, shes a legend, and she is the moment. Shes M3gan, the killer-doll flick that set the internet ablaze when the titular android did a little dance in an October trailer. M3gan slaughtered… [+1282 chars]

articles.title: Vitamin D Status a Common Health Concern for People with Lupus, Though Not Linked to Disease Activity - Lupus Foundation of America
articles.description: Research shows that while taking vitamin D supplements can be a great way to increase blood levels of vitamin D, it may not improve lupus disease activity.
articles.content: Nicknamed the sunshine vitamin, vitamin D can be made by the body when skin is exposed to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun. However, many people with lupus need to avoid the sun due to photose… [+1583 chars]

articles.title: Three Amigos summit set to start against backdrop of political crises in Mexico - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: This week’s North American Leaders’ Summit is taking place amid mounting accusations of autocracy against the Mexican President
